They tried changing my point of view towards trump but they didnâ€™t really try at all. I grabbed my leaf blower and low and be hold they are cardboard cutouts! I couldâ€™ve sworn they were talking to me but i guess not. Nothing seems real anymore, my wife is cardboard, my baby is cardboard. This app has ruined my entire life. One star.

attributes.title: Demon Planet

attributes.title: Ughhhh, I am disgusted

attributes.title: The Worst App
attributes.review: This is simply a terrible app. The functions are glitchy, the appearance is tacky and outdated, and the message it sends is hateful. I tried to give it a chance, but it took up more space on my phone than it said it would and tried to access my phoneâ€™s camera, microphone, and other features without asking for permission first. Also, why does it need access to those things in the first place?? I think itâ€™s trying to watch out every move, and listen to our conversations. Overall, this is the worst app you can get. Avoid it like the plague.
